summary: Diff adds a deployment slug constant/documentation plus SPA hosting fallback files (_redirects, 404.html). However, there is no concrete evidence in the diff of an actual platform deployment/publish configuration or that the chosen slug is wired into the hosting/deployment system; publish/live reachability and route accessibility cannot be verified from the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Select and configure a valid deployment domain/slug that includes "blackrays" and satisfies platform domain rules, and ensure the invalid prior domain is not used.
missing_requirements.reason: A valid-looking slug is introduced in code/docs, but the diff summary does not show it being applied to any real deployment/hosting configuration (i.e., no evidence the platform will actually use this slug for the live domain).

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish/deploy the current website so it is live and reachable at the configured domain/slug, with primary routes accessible.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any deployment pipeline/configuration (e.g., platform config, CI/CD, hosting settings) or any evidence of an actual publish action. Added SPA fallback files help hosting, but they do not demonstrate that a live deployment exists or that routes are reachable at a configured live URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer change adding `appIdentifier` derived from `window.location.hostname` and updating footer attribution link parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-14/REQ-15; unrelated to selecting a deployment slug or publishing the site.
